tool_description: Calculates comprehensive financial impact of chargebacks, refunds, and dispute resolution activities including fees and projections.

calculation_type.description: Type of calculation: single_dispute, monthly_summary, or annual_projection

merchant_id.description: Merchant account identifier for fee structure

dispute_resolution_cost.description: Internal cost of dispute resolution in cents

error_messages: Invalid calculation type: Use one of [single_dispute, monthly_summary, annual_projection]. Verify the calculation_type parameter spelling.
Negative amounts not allowed: dispute_amount, chargeback_fee, and dispute_resolution_cost must be positive values. Check all monetary parameters.
Merchant not found: The merchant_id does not exist in the system. Verify the merchant identifier and ensure account access.
usage: Specify calculation_type, dispute_amount, and merchant_id to calculate financial impact. Optionally adjust chargeback_fee and dispute_resolution_cost for accurate cost modeling.

total_financial_impact.description: Total calculated financial impact in cents

breakdown_fees.description: Sum of all processing fees in cents

lost_revenue.description: Revenue lost from disputed transactions in cents

recovery_probability.description: Estimated probability of recovering disputed amount (0-1)
